text: Good morning guys, I need to add the HubSpot munchkin code and I don't know how to do it, do you have any idea how to do it?
sorry not exactly sure what a munchkin code is but would this help? <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/reports/install-the-HubSpot-tracking-code>
I will try it, thank you very much for your answer <@U01QVR44MEY> did you ever do it in wordpress? it says that you only need to install a plugin and that's it.

Yeah you can just install this plugin and it will walk you through the setup: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/integrations/install-the-HubSpot-wordpress-plugin|install and use the HubSpot All-in-One Marketing - Forms, Pop-ups, Live Chat WordPress plugin>
